body.name: Epson Workforce WF-110 Wireless Color Mobile Printer,White, Small,Black
body.stockDetail: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 41 mins
features: Epson printing system is designed to be used exclusively with Epson Genuine Cartridges. Use of non-genuine ink could cause damage not covered under the printer’s ltd. wnty.
Flexible battery charging — Choose from a variety of charging options, including via USB and AC adapter, or print on AC power.
Built-in battery — a rechargeable lithium-ion battery offers dependable performance in a small package.
External accessory battery available — for even greater Print volume.
Wireless connectivity, plus Wi-Fi Direct (1) — Wi-Fi 5; easily print from iPad, iPhone, tablets, smartphones and laptops (2).
body.description: Enjoy fast, effortless printing wherever business takes you with the workforce wf-110 wireless mobile printer. Featuring a sleek, ultra light design, This compact mobile printer can be easily transported in bags and briefcases for worry-free printing on the go. This powerful, portable printing solution is fully rechargeable via USB or AC adapter and can provide even greater Print volume when paired with the optional external accessory battery. Plus, with built-in wireless connectivity and Wi-Fi Direct (1), the wf-110 lets you quickly print presentations, invoices, contracts and more from the convenience of your iPad, iPhone, tablet, smartphone or laptop (2).this product uses only genuine Epson-brand cartridges. Other brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies are not compatible and, even if described as Compatible, may not function properly. Print speed quoted using AC power. Battery-powered Print speeds are 3.5 ISO ppm (black) and 2.0 ISO ppm (color). Black and color print speeds are measured in accordance with ISO/IEC 24734. Actual print times will vary based on factors including system configuration, software, and page complexity. For more information, visit our official site.1. Wi-fi certified; level of performance subject to the range of the router being used. Wi-fi Direct may require printer software.2. Most features require an Internet connection to the printer, as well as an Internet- and/or email-enabled device. For a list of Epson Connect enabled printers and compatible devices and apps, visit our official site.3. See our official site for device compatibility. Epson connect account and voice-activated account registration required.4. For convenient and reasonable recycling options, visit our official site.5. Smart way is an innovative partnership of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency that reduces greenhouse gases and other air pollutants and improves fuel efficiency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slow, but might small
reviews.reviewText: If you have to travel for work and need a printer on the go, this little thing is packable and mini. It's not the fastest printer out there but it consider what it is. Happy with purchase. Easy to operate and install cartridges.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed would be an understatement
reviews.reviewText: The connectivity is lightning fast, easy to setup, and not a whole lot of useless on between. Very compact and I can take this anywhere on the road with me. As a mobile notary I am always needing documents printed on the fly and the quality of this printer is really top notch. It also comes with one free color ink cartridge and one free black ink cartridge. This compact printer has definitely made me a believer of expecting big things from small packages

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm shocked with how tiny this printer is compared to the HP 3830 it is replacing. Print quality is at par with the HP printer. I lose out on scanning functionality, but I can make do with my iphone. For anyone who prints infrequently and needs some space saving, this is a great choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent size printer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Inkjet printers have existed since the 1980s and Windows 10 has been around since 2014. How is it possible in this golden age of technology that a tech company could have such a difficult time providing something as fundamentally basic as a printer that simply prints a document sent from Windows? Seriously, Epson? Is it too much to hope for that when I press print that a document with comes out of the printer without having to reboot or reinstall a driver or spend hours on the internet looking for obscure solutions for your poorly executed product? I am not trying anything exotic like cloud printing a PowerPoint from my Android phone from halfway around the world. I am sitting at a laptop on my home network printing a test page. With all the money you make from the replacement ink, there should be a little budget somewhere to hire at least one developer who could track down the bugs and and address some of the reliability issues.It is an understatement to say that this printer has been one gigantic frustration. How long did I spend wondering why the "next" button was grey out on the install until I realized I needed to click on the picture of the printer in the dialog? More than I wanted. I am not a tech idiot. I know more than enough about printers, drivers, networking, and software development which means I know this is probably not a chair to keyboard interface problem. If it is, then it is one caused by Epson's inability to make something usable by mere mortals. I also don't accept the cheerful "we care so please contact support and we will work it out for you" suggestions that always gets posted as a response to these negative reviews by image management companies hired by tech companies like Epson who are to preserve sales of poorly executed products. Anything support will tell me to do is already available on the web and I have already tried it. Plus, should I really have to spend 4 hours on a weekend trying to get something as trivial as an inkjet printer to work? This is not complicated technology. It should just work, out of the box, period. IMHO, this printer is a symbol of the complete lack of respect Epson has for the user experience. I am sorry I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact. Battery last long. Color and black.
reviews.reviewText: Good quality materials. Well designed. Compact. Battery last long. Color and black.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a real printer!
reviews.reviewText: I've owned this now for many months, and I am very pleased with this printer! I was a bit worried that it would not be a reliable option, being so compact, but that is not true. this is really a quality little printer! I travel 6 months out of the year, so having this along is great. I highly recommend getting the co2CREA case for this, also on Amazon. the case is sized so that it can hold a supply of 81/2 x 11 paper as well as the printer and all the extras.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm having mad difficulty trying to return this product, I want a new one because the box came with a giant hole in it.
I wanted a printer that I could take with me and I was surprised on how durable it was and how easy it was to set up. Also that print quality is pretty good
Parfaite juste bien la bonne grosseur

reviews.reviewTitle: Pire imprimante j’ai jamais utilisé. Une femme dans sa semaine est plus simple.
reviews.reviewText: Se connecte a l’ordinateur, refuse d’imprimée, as fonctionner une seul fois sur 90 tentative. Après avoir réussi a imprimer ce que j’avais besoin, je l’ai fermer, j’ai dut repasser à travers le meme processus. J’ai fait la seul bonne chose à faire. La CRISSER au bout de mes bras et la finir a avec une masse. Très satisfesant et défoulant. Perte de temps et d’argent incroyable. (Non je ne pouvais pas me faire remboursé je l’ai utilisé après les dates possible)

I would recommend this just for the sheer convenience. I’ve only had it for a week and it’s already made my job as a service technician and refrigeration much better. I can print out signed invoices and quotes on the spot. I haven’t used it on battery power yet only plugged in because my work van has an inverter. One part I would like improved is ink cartridge sizes. I knooow I knoooow, I get it that it’s a small portable printer designed for the convenience of being small I’m just nitpicking at this point because this things awesome :)
price was good and light weight easy to carry in back pact prints well.
